pullRequest.title: Fix serialization bug in SearchableSnapshotsStatsResponse
pullRequest.bodyText: SearchableSnapshotsStatsResponse is missing the serialization of the list of SearchableSnapshotShardStats.

nodes.bodyText: We can't use AbstractBroadcastResponseTestCase here because it relies on XContent parsing. We can't use AbstractWireSerializingTestCase as it relies on object equality, which is not implemented by BroadcastResponse.
